This response provides a comprehensive overview of the significance of Jesus being referred to as a ransom in Christianity. In future responses, it would be beneficial for the student to focus more on the doctrinal aspects of Christian beliefs and address any challenges to those beliefs with a firm foundation in Christian theology.
